title: For Traders special
description: For Traders, based in the United Arab Emirates and established June 2023, is a CFD firm offering Instant, 1 Step, 2 Steps and 3 Steps programs. Account sizes range from $5,000 to $200,000. Platforms supported include MetaTrader 4, MetaTrader 5 (MT5), cTrader and TradeLocker. Tradable instruments include forex pairs, commodities, equities, indices and cryptocurrencies. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: Passing the challenge in a single trade is not allowed; your largest trade must not exceed 70% of your profit target.
40% Margin Rule: This rule prevents you from using more than 40% of your available margin for a single trade or multiple trades on the same instrument in the same direction.
Account Limits: Max allocation $200k ($100k from challenge account and $100k instant funding). $300k with Premium program.

payout_policy.details: 1 & 2-step: 80%, 90% with higher cost or 70% with cheaper cost. 3-Step: 80%. Instant Master: 70%, increases by 5% with each payout up to 90%. Instant Master Pro: 60% increases by 10% with each payout up to 90%. (To be eligible for any withdrawal, your account must have at least 3% growth). For rewards over $500: Rise Pay (Processing fee: $50). For rewards under $500: Direct Crypto Transfer via ERC20 in USDC (Processing fee: $25).

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed between For Traders Accounts and from your For Traders account (acting as the Master account), but copying trades to a For Traders account is strictly prohibited.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: EAs are allowed only if they assist your personal trading decisions â€” fully automated or self-trading EAs & bots are strictly prohibited.
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: Accounts with no meaningful trading activity for 30 consecutive days will be terminated (7 days for Instant accounts), with inactivity counted from the time the last position is closed.
firm_rules.news_trading: Evaluation Phase: Allowed with No Restriction. Master Accounts: You can hold trades during news events but opening positions within 5 minutes before or after high-impact news is not allowed; profits from such trades will be deducted.
forbidden_strategies: Passing the challenge in a single trade is not allowed; your largest trade must not exceed 70% of your profit target.
40% Margin Rule: This rule prevents you from using more than 40% of your available margin for a single trade or multiple trades on the same instrument in the same direction.
Account Limits: Max allocation $200k ($100k from challenge account and $100k instant funding). $300k with Premium program.

seo_content:
For Traders Technical Infrastructure

For Traders, based in the United Arab Emirates and established June 2023, is a CFD firm offering Instant, 1 Step, 2 Steps and 3 Steps programs. Account sizes range from $5,000 to $200,000. Platforms supported include MetaTrader 4, MetaTrader 5 (MT5), cTrader and TradeLocker. Tradable instruments include forex pairs, commodities, equities, indices and cryptocurrencies. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
